string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Agent O's Encouragement

string.name: desc
string.value: An encouraging message from Agent O. Jump rate will be increased by 20 for 30 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Agent O's Encouragement

string.name: desc
string.value: An encouraging message from Agent O. Speed will be increased by 40 for 30 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Chick Cookie

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a cookie shaped like a baby chick. Recovers 1000 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Box

string.name: desc
string.value: Secret Box

string.name: name
string.value: Sorcerer's Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a potion that you can buy from Sorcerer. It's potent, but its side-effects are equally strong. It's also very expensive, so be careful with it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +14 Weapon Attack for 15 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +22 Weapon Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +90 Weapon Attack for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +50 Magic Attack for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +200 Magic Attack for 30 seconds.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Tasty and strong enough to dissolve rust from machinery! Drink at your own risk! [Gives +700 Magic Attack for 10 seconds.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Drink at your own risk! Gives the user a sudden jolting surge of energy, so use it or lose it! [Gives +1000 Magic Attack for 5 seconds.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Energizer Drink

string.name: desc
string.value: An energizing drink packed with electrolytes. For 30 minutes, you will receive a boost of: Attack +25, Magic Attack +30, Defense +30

string.name: name
string.value: Tick-Tock's Egg

string.name: desc
string.value: This is Tick-Tock's egg. There must be something inside.

string.name: name
string.value: Cronos' Egg

string.name: desc
string.value: This is Cronos' egg. There must be something inside.

string.name: name
string.value: Holiday Buff

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Holiday Buff

string.value: A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed +7.

string.name: name
string.value: Holiday Buff

string.name: desc
string.value: A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed and Jump +10.

string.name: name
string.value: Elixir of Darkness

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious concoction of herbs brewed deep within the mountains of El Nath. [Gives +200 Magic Attack, -25 Defense for 5 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Dust

string.name: desc
string.value: Ancient dust found long ago by the miners in El Nath. [Gives +20 Defense for 5 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Adonis Cauldron

string.name: desc
string.value: A rather clumsy attempt at potion creation by Adonis. Still useful in the hands of a skilled warrior. [Gives +40 Weapon Attack, +50 Avoidability, -30 Defense for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: The fireworks for celebrating MV's defeat. Speed +5, Physical & Magic Attack +5 for 20 min.

string.name: name
string.value: Mihile's Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Cygnus's Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: Once I completed Cygnus' Book, the spirit's power covered me and blessed me. It increased my Attack Rate by 10, Physical Defense Rate by 80 and Speed by 5 for 10 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Red Easter Egg

string.name: desc
string.value: A freshly boiled egg colored in red. Recovers 400 HP and MP.

string.value: Return Scroll for Dead Mine

string.value: Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath.nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Command Center Warp Capsule

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.

string.name: name
string.value: Ludibrium Warp Capsule

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that returns you to Ludibrium.

string.name: name
string.value: Phyllia's Warp Powder

string.name: desc
string.value: Warp powder made by fairy Phyllia. Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.

string.name: name
string.value: Nautilus Return Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll enables you to return to the Pirate village, Nautilus. This is a one use item and will disappear after use.

string.name: name
string.value: Return Scroll - Banished Area

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the map where you were last banished. Requires immediate use and have changed neither maps nor channels.

string.name: name
string.value: Masked Man's Invitation

string.name: name

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the studio for the event "For Guild Only".

string.name: name
string.value: Pet Food

string.name: desc
string.value: Small pets love them. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human!

string.name: name
string.value: Dry Treat

string.name: desc
string.value: A high-quality dry treat that the Pigmies love. Pets love them, too.

string.name: name
string.value: New Year's Card

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on the item to send a New Year's card to a character of your choice.

string.name: name
string.value: Lie Detector Test

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: name
string.value: Orange Mushroom Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Ribbon Pig Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Grey Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Elixir

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious elixir made by Moira which enables anyone that drinks this potion to temporarily transform into a dragon.

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun Transformation Bundle.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret medicine that allows you to transform into Tigun, the patrol guard.

string.name: name
string.value: Rainbow-colored Snail Shell

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell only found through Mano. Apparently it's powerful enough to grant a wish...

string.name: name
string.value: Change to Ghost

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.

string.name: name
string.value: Sophillia's Abandoned Doll

string.name: desc
string.value: An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Potion of Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: name
string.value: Potion of Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: name
string.value: Change to Mouse

string.name: desc
string.value: Transform into a small, tiny mouse.

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Draco Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.

string.name: name
string.value: Cody's Picture

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture given by Cody of himself. I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.

string.name: name
string.value: Cake Picture

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture of a delicious cake that Cody gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny with happen when I use it.

string.name: name
string.value: Cliff's Special Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour. It's all about the risk...

string.name: name
string.value: Maplemas Party Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!

string.name: name
string.value: Moonstone Engagement Ring Box

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of Moon Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: name
string.value: Star gem Engagement Ring Box

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of Star Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: name
string.value: Golden Heart Engagement Ring Box

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of gold. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: name
string.value: Silver Swan Engagement Ring Box

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of silver. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: name
string.value: Pheromone Perfume

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume created by Kenta using Pheromone. Enables the user to tame hogs down at the Korean Folk Village.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.

string.name: name
string.value: Element Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.

string.name: name
string.value: Cliff's Magic Cane

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic cane that tames the lost Rudolph.

string.name: name
string.value: Purification Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.

string.name: name
string.value: 1st Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 1st floor.

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor.

string.name: name
string.value: 3rd Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.

string.name: name
string.value: Lava Bottle

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Cloud Machine

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: name
string.value: Firm Hand

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire The Will of a Warrior.

string.name: name
string.value: [Skill Book] Maple Warrior

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: The Owl of Minerva

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: name
string.value: Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

string.name: name
string.value: White Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Subani's sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

string.name: name
string.value: Change to Ghost

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Take this to change into a ghost for 1 hour.

string.value: Blue Ribbon Pig Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.value: Mysterious Sack

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra says that it's impossible to know what monsters will be summoned from this sack, but it may summon special, hard-to-find monsters.

string.value: A card that features a Balrog.ncIncreases the Item/Meso drop rates in the central dungeon of Victoria.#

string.name: name
string.value: Mysterious Piece of Paper

string.name: desc
string.value: It's full of mysterious scribbles. n#cA quest will begin when you double-click it.#

string.name: name
string.value: Empty Compass

string.name: desc
string.value: A compass with no markings. However, it can be turned into a working compass if you have the letters #cN,E, W,S#.

string.name: name
string.value: Golden Compass

string.name: desc
string.value: A golden compass that reveals the location of Gold Richie's Treasure Island. n#cBy double-clicking it# you can move to the island.

string.name: name
string.value: Pure Perfume

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume that contains the scent of an inexperienced adventurer. n#cBy double-clicking on it#, that scent is released to confuse monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Mysterious Artifact

string.name: desc
string.value: An artifact with an unknown date of origin.\n#cDouble-click# on it to find out its date of origin.

string.name: name
string.value: Chicken Kapitan

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Malaysian dish. This mild curry contains chicken pieces with rich coconut milk, onions and spices. \nRecovers 4000 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Mee Siam

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Malaysian dish made up of thin rice noodles. Served with salted soy beans, dried bean curd, boiled egg and tamarind. \nRecovers 4000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: This famous dish is served with generous amounts of sweet thick, spicy peanut sauce with bean curds, prawn fritters, hard-boiled eggs and bean sprouts.\nRecovers 1000 HP and 1000 MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Kangkung belacan

string.name: desc
string.value: This spicy vegetable dish is served with KanKung (water spinach) and spicy sambal.nImproves Weapon Attack and Magic Attack +8 for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: These sweet, bite-sized delights are a favorite pastry dish served during parties and just for tea.nImproves Speed +10 for 30 minutes.

string.value: A legendary potion. \nRecovers 50% HP and MP and cancels abnormal statuses. It can recover all abnormal statuses.

string.name: desc
string.value: A drink with "Energy Boost" written on the label. Consuming this drink will grant ATT +25, MP +30, DEF +30, and Jump +10 for 30 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Energy Drink

string.name: desc
string.value: Consuming this drink will increase MAX HP for a set amount of time.
